title: Battle Reunion
opening: The Crimean army defeats General Petrine, one of King Ashnard's feared Four Riders, and finally arrives home. The princess's return  is met with the jubilation and tears of the retainers who have managed to survive. As long as we have Princess Elincia, Crimea will be liberated. These are the words that gave the people hope as they endured the harsh rule of a conquering country. The silent masses, who long for the restoration of their homeland, slowly begin to give voice to their dream. Surely, they think, this chance to see Crimea freed will not be wasted.

intro.speaker: Geoffrey
intro.line: Can it be?

intro.speaker: Bastian
intro.line: There is no mistake in my words. The princess has returned to Crimea! Lady Lucia serves as her guide. They should be on their way here as we speak.

intro.speaker: Geoffrey
intro.line: How long it's been since we've seen the princess...We have been living for the day where we  steal the eyes from Daein's army and bring her home. And now it has come.

intro.speaker: Bastian
intro.line: Indeed. For His Majesty, for the Queen, and..for Crown Prince Renning as well...We must act as one and support our beloved Princess Elincia.

intro.speaker: Geoffrey
intro.line: Yes. If all goes well...our dearest wish will soon come to fulfillment.

intro.speaker: Bastian
intro.line: There's no time to wait. If we wish to properly greet the princess and her retinue, there is much to be done.

intro.speaker: Geoffrey
intro.line: Right! Let's let everyone know! We must divide the tasks and begin preparations for a feast at once!

intro.speaker: Bastian
intro.line: And flowers must be prepared for the princess's chamber! Oh, we mustn't forget music and entertainment, either.

intro.speaker: Geoffrey
intro.line: I suppose I shall have to polish the silver tableware I was hiding, too.

intro.speaker: Bastian
intro.line: You? You possess such refined things? I figured a rustic boor like you would have sold them for a lamb shank.

intro.speaker: Geoffrey
intro.line: I received the silver from His Majesty when I was awarded my knighthood... I have been saving it for just such an occasion.

intro.speaker: Bastian
intro.line: Well done! Get ready! We are going to be very, very busy! Ha ha! What a fantastic day this will be!

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: The Crimean retainers are waiting for us at this Castle Delbray?

intro.speaker: Lucia
intro.line: Yes. In your absence, Princess, we used the cellars beneath the castle as a secret meeting place. It is from there that we contacted other retainers who were hiding throughout the land.

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: And no one was discovered?

intro.speaker: Lucia
intro.line: We disguised ourselves as merchants or peasants, and Daein looked right past us. Their arrogance is without equal...However, now that we've heard of your return, we are bringing out our hidden Crimean armor and polishing away!

intro.speaker: Elincia
intro.line: Merchants? Ha! Geoffrey is one thing, but I cannot imagine Bastian as a shopkeeper.

intro.speaker: Lucia
intro.line: No one could. That's why he dressed as a street performer.

intro.speaker: Elincia
intro.line: Now that, I can see! I'm sure it suited him perfectly. Did he juggle and gambol about? Hee hee!!

intro.speaker: Lucia
intro.line: And Geoffrey... Never have you seen a merchant with such perfect posture!

intro.speaker: Elincia
intro.line: Hee hee hee! That sounds just like him.

intro.speaker: Mist
intro.line: Princess Elincia seems to be having a wonderful time. She's been smiling and laughing for hours.

intro.speaker: Ranulf
intro.line: It seems she and Lucia grew up together. She feels completely at ease around her.

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: The princess seemed to be of good cheer when she was with us as well, but...I suppose she was putting on a brave face.

intro.speaker: Titania
intro.line: When I see her in this light, I'm reminded that she's still only a young woman. What we see now is the princess as she was before Daein's attack. That is the true Princess Elincia.

intro.speaker: Ranulf
intro.line: It's good to be home, isn't it? We've still many battles ahead, but for tonight, we should relax and let ourselves forget our cares. No one can continue under this much stress forever, right?

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: I suppose you're right.

intro.speaker: Geoffrey
intro.line: Today's the happy day the princess returns, yet the goddess sees fit to bring rain...

intro.speaker: Bastian
intro.line: Calm rain is like a kiss upon the face. A scent and feel unparalleled in kind. Reunions in the rain are most heartfelt.

intro.speaker: Geoffrey
intro.line: Say, Bastian... How far do you suppose the princess and her escort have come? Why aren't they here yet?

intro.speaker: Bastian
intro.line: ...Sigh. Listen, friend. You have asked me that same question fifty-eight times. And I have responded fifty-seven times. But now, fifty-eight comes anon...You. Need. To. Calm. Yourself.

intro.speaker: Geoffrey
intro.line: I know, but--

intro.speaker: Bastian
intro.line: It's only a little while longer. Make no mistake, our princess will arrive today. I understand your impatience, I really do. But you're the general of our little army. If you act so, the men will react in kind.

intro.speaker: Geoffrey
intro.line: You, you're right...

intro.speaker: Bastian
intro.line: A true knight is the essence of composure. Take a deep breath. Breathe in...and out...

intro.speaker: Geoffrey
intro.line: ...Sigh......Woooooo...!...Whew...

intro.speaker: Bastian
intro.line: See? Don't you feel better?

intro.speaker: Geoffrey
intro.line: ...Hmmm...Ah, blast! It's no good! I'm going to go...uh... Check on...stuff!

intro.speaker: Bastian
intro.line: What am I supposed to do with him?

intro.speaker: Geoffrey
intro.line: They're here! I see them!

intro.speaker: Bastian
intro.line: What? Really?

intro.speaker: Geoffrey
intro.line: That's them, isn't it? The princess's army?

intro.speaker: Bastian
intro.line: Where? Show me where you're looking. Geoffrey, that's not the princess...Those are...Daein troops!

intro.speaker: Geoffrey
intro.line: What? No! Please tell me you're joking...

intro.speaker: Lucia
intro.line: Once we cross the hills, we'll be in Delbray territory. Count Bastian went ahead of us, so they should know of your return by now. Speaking of which...here he comes now! I suppose he couldn't wait any longer and came riding to meet you. How sweet.

intro.speaker: Unknown
intro.line: Princess Elincia! Lady Lucia!

intro.speaker: Elincia
intro.line: Bastian! There's no need for you to rush so! I'm coming in your direction anyway--

intro.speaker: Bastian
intro.line: We've been attacked! Castle Delbray is surrounded by enemy troops!

intro.speaker: Elincia
intro.line: No!

intro.speaker: Lucia
intro.line: It can't be...

intro.speaker: Bastian
intro.line: Geoffrey's acting as a decoy. You must continue on this road to the southwest.

intro.speaker: Lucia
intro.line: So the enemy's found us, eh?

intro.speaker: Lucia
intro.line: Nothing to do about it but change course. I'll lead you to another hiding place.

intro.speaker: Elincia
intro.line: Wh-what are you saying, Lucia? We must help Geoffrey! Bastian?

intro.speaker: Lucia
intro.line: Luck was not with us, Princess. We have no choice. We'll have to abandon our companions in Castle Delbray.

intro.speaker: Elincia
intro.line: No!! We will not!! Geoffrey and the others have survived so much already... I will not abandon them!

intro.speaker: Lucia
intro.line: Princess, please understand. If we could do so without danger to you, we would gladly risk our lives to go back.

intro.speaker: Elincia
intro.line: We cannot do this! Please, Lucia! We must go to the castle! ...Bastian! You must not do this thing!

intro.speaker: Bastian
intro.line: Geoffrey is a knight. In the name of our friend's honor, Princess, you must escape.

intro.speaker: Elincia
intro.line: No... No! They've survived this long! They're alive! NO!!!

intro.speaker: Lucia
intro.line: General Ike... We don't have much time. While we stand here squabbling, Daein scouts may spot our position. Please move the army southwest on this road.

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: No.

intro.speaker: Lucia
intro.line: Pardon? What did you say?

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: We're going to the castle. If it's surrounded by Daein troops, we cut our way through and join the other knights. Understood?

intro.speaker: Lucia
intro.line: Weren't you listening? I said we had no choice but to leave them behind! They were lost to us the moment the enemy discovered and surrounded them!

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: They're not so lost that we can't take them back.

intro.speaker: Lucia
intro.line: You are the general of Crimea's army, are you not?...Even if only for the moment? I would hope that you would act more in accordance with your responsibilities.

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: I didn't choose or ask to be general. I was put here by matters of time and circumstance. But, as a mercenary, I have a contract with Princess Elincia that's still in effect. That means she's my employer. And right now, my employer says she wants to go and save the people stuck in that castle. Is that correct, Elincia?

intro.speaker: Elincia
intro.line: Yes. I don't want... I don't want anyone else to be sacrificed.

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: So...we're going to help them. If you're so worried about the princess, I'll leave her here with you, and you can keep her safe.

intro.speaker: Elincia
intro.line: My lord Ike...

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: They're coming into view! Combat formations!

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: Our goal is to rescue those knights near the castle!

battle.speaker: Black Knight
battle.line: Is that the Crimean army?...Where is Gawain's son?...Ah... He's much improved...He is his father's son after all. Contrary to my initial estimation, he may prove to be worthy.

battle.speaker: Titania
battle.line: Ike! The castle has fallen to the enemy!

battle-talk.speaker: Bastian
battle-talk.line: H-hold a moment! Please, my brave general!

battle-talk.speaker: Ike
battle-talk.line: You again?

battle-talk.speaker: Bastian
battle-talk.line: I was but a humble court official in the service of our late king. My name is Bastian, Count of Fayre. Allow me to give you proper greeting and respects, General Ike. Many thanks are due to you! I am here to formally request your permission to join in the battle taking place in the--

battle-talk.speaker: Ike
battle-talk.line: Shut up! We're in combat! If you want to prattle on and on like this, do so after we defeat the enemy!

battle-talk.speaker: Bastian
battle-talk.line: Oh, yes, but of course...Well! It seems I've found yet another font of good humor... Hmph.

battle-talk.speaker: Lucia
battle-talk.line: General Ike! Allow me to apologize for my earlier remarks! I've a selfish request, but... I would like to join--

battle-talk.speaker: Ike
battle-talk.line: Yeah, all right, fine. Now hurry up!

battle-talk.speaker: Lucia
battle-talk.line: Eh?

battle-talk.speaker: Ike
battle-talk.line: If you've got the time to apologize, you've got time to take out some enemies!

battle-talk.speaker: Lucia
battle-talk.line: Of course! To save my companions, I will give my all!

battle-talk.speaker: Ike
battle-talk.line: Fantastic. Now let's go!

battle-talk.speaker: Ike
battle-talk.line: Are you Sir Geoffrey?

battle-talk.speaker: Geoffrey
battle-talk.line: Eh? Who are you?

battle-talk.speaker: Ike
battle-talk.line: I'm Ike. I'm leading the Crimean army for Princess Elincia!

battle-talk.speaker: Geoffrey
battle-talk.line: The princess, where is she?

battle-talk.speaker: Ike
battle-talk.line: Don't worry. I didn't bring her to the battlefield with me.

battle-talk.speaker: Geoffrey
battle-talk.line: I see... Thank goodness...Thank you for that regard!

battle-talk.speaker: Ike
battle-talk.line: Are the other soldiers inside the castle?

battle-talk.speaker: Geoffrey
battle-talk.line: Yes. I'm sure they're staving off any attacks by enemy infiltrators.

battle-talk.speaker: Ike
battle-talk.line: Good. I'm glad we made it in time. Let's combine forces and finish this!

battle-talk.speaker: Bastian
battle-talk.line: Are you well, my friend?

battle-talk.speaker: Geoffrey
battle-talk.line: Bastian...? Why did you come back?

battle-talk.speaker: Bastian
battle-talk.line: I'll explain it to you later! For the sake of the princess, expend your energy on living!

battle-talk.speaker: Geoffrey
battle-talk.line: Understood!

battle-talk.speaker: Lucia
battle-talk.line: Geoffrey! I'm so glad we made it in time!

battle-talk.speaker: Geoffrey
battle-talk.line: Lucia, my sister...What are you doing? Why did you leave the side of the princess!

battle-talk.speaker: Lucia
battle-talk.line: There's no time to discuss it now! Just know that she is safe. If you want to see her yourself, you'd best try and survive!

battle-talk.speaker: Geoffrey
battle-talk.line: Sister! Wait! ...Blast!

battle-talk.speaker: Kieran
battle-talk.line: Crimean Royal Knight, Fifth Platoon Captain Kieran reporting for duty, sir!

battle-talk.speaker: Geoffrey
battle-talk.line: Kieran! You live?

battle-talk.speaker: Kieran
battle-talk.line: Yes sir, General! I was taken prisoner by Daein and held in the dungeon of Canteus Castle. Oh, it was a vile place! They tried all manner of terrible tortures on me...but I resisted to the last! Then I was freed by a company of mercenaries in the hire of Princess Elincia! Since that time, I have been faithfully at the side of the princess protecting her from all harm!

battle-talk.speaker: Geoffrey
battle-talk.line: Is the princess in good spirits?

battle-talk.speaker: Kieran
battle-talk.line: She is! General Geoffrey, it is her great wish that you live, so that she may see you once again!

battle-talk.speaker: Geoffrey
battle-talk.line: Is that...so? Very well! Now that I've heard that, I must stay alive at any cost! Rally your hearts, men of Crimea! We will fight and we will win! The princess needs her castle!

visit.speaker: Woman
visit.line: Oh, thank the goddess! The Crimean army has arrived. We who have suffered so much under Daein's rule will finally be free! We can put our faith in that, can't we? If there's anything we can do to help, we'll do it. Please, rescue our beloved Crimea.

visit.speaker: Man
visit.line: You're part of the army that brought the princess, aren't you? Oh, you've done a great thing! I've been hiding this scroll so I could give it to you. Use it to drive Daein out of our homeland! You can do it!

boss.speaker: Rikard
boss.line: I am Rikard! Your corpse will be the sustenance that feeds my hunger for fame!

boss.speaker: Rikard
boss.line: No matter one's proven deeds,...one defeat unmans us all...And so...it ends...

boss.speaker: Black Knight
boss.line: Fool! Run now, and I'll let you live.

boss.speaker: Black Knight
boss.line: Is that all you have? It seems you do not possess the talents to surpass your father after all. A pity.

end.speaker: Black Knight
end.line: And yet another general of Daein is defeated...I wonder how powerful you will become, army of Crimea. I look forward to our next meeting...

end.speaker: Elincia
end.line: My lord Ike!

end.speaker: Ike
end.line: Princess Elincia! So you came after all.

end.speaker: Elincia
end.line: Thanks to your words, both of my friends came to understand how vital it was.

end.speaker: Ike
end.line: I don't understand the feelings of knights. But, I do understand how important your former retainers are to you. And I also understand the strong support with which they provide you. I'm happy we were able to save them.

end.speaker: Elincia
end.line: As am I!

end.speaker: Ike
end.line: All right, shall we return? If I'm going to be fighting with them, I should probably introduce myself.

end.speaker: Elincia
end.line: Wait, my lord Ike.

end.speaker: Ike
end.line: Yes?

end.speaker: Elincia
end.line: As you said, Lucia and the others are very important to me. They are family. I may presume too much, but...well...My lord Ike, you and the others are also irreplaceable to me, so... I ask for your continued support!

end.speaker: Ike
end.line: Of course. It's an honor.

end.speaker: Geoffrey
end.line: Princess!

end.speaker: Elincia
end.line: Geoffrey!

end.speaker: Geoffrey
end.line: Princess... Ah, to behold you again...It's... It's...

end.speaker: Elincia
end.line: If you had lost your life today, this reunion would not be taking place. Geoffrey, do you hear me? Be careful!

end.speaker: Geoffrey
end.line: Yes, Princess. Lucia...told me of what occurred. Our country and princess now exist as one. It was never our intent to sacrifice your feelings for the sake of the nation. Please forgive us.

end.speaker: Bastian
end.line: But soft! What luck that we do feel fate's kiss? Anon, the clouds do part, the rains do stop. Heaven itself does sing and thus rejoice. At the return of our one true ruler! Oh, Princess... Until world's end, do you we vow to follow! We are planets of your fair blazing sun!

end.speaker: Lucia
end.line: No longer will we think of honor and dying in so cavalier a fashion. No matter the difficulties we face, we will choose the road that allows us to continue living at your side.

end.speaker: Ike
end.line: Why appear now? Do you mean to tell me you purposely waited until the battle was over?

end.speaker: Black Knight
end.line: Hmph. I know how your mind works. I assumed you would attack the moment you saw me. But perhaps you've learned to judge the importance of time and place.

end.speaker: Ike
end.line: To a mercenary, nothing's more important than the contract between him and his employer.

end.speaker: Black Knight
end.line: Shall we call off our contest then? When you die here, you'll be in breach of contract after all.

end.speaker: Ike
end.line: That's not a problem. All I have to do is win... Ready yourself!

end.speaker: Black Knight
end.line: Hmph.

end.speaker: Black Knight
end.line: You're not as overly clumsy as I had feared. It is regrettable that your weapon is so poorly made.

end.speaker: Ike
end.line: Why do my attacks have no effect?

end.speaker: Black Knight
end.line: My armor is blessed by the goddess. Only weapons that are also blessed can so much as scratch it.

end.speaker: Ike
end.line: Grrr... So common weaponry is useless? Is that it?

end.speaker: Black Knight
end.line: You should not worry about such trivialities. You possess the sacred blade Ragnell, do you not?

end.speaker: Ike
end.line: Ah!

end.speaker: Black Knight
end.line: It is the counterpart to my blade, Alondite. Tell me you were not idiot enough to leave it in that place. You took it with you, did you not? Along with your father's corpse?

end.speaker: Ike
end.line: That...that sword? The one you threw to my father like an act of charity? The one he refused? That's Ragnell?

end.speaker: Black Knight
end.line: I claim victory today. When next we meet, bring Ragnell. Without the proper weapon, I grow bored.

conversation.speaker: Marcia
conversation.line: Ah! Ike! There, hiding in the shadows of that tent! Grab him!

conversation.speaker: Ike
conversation.line: Huh? What?

conversation.speaker: Makalov
conversation.line: Hey! Ouch! Come on, you gotta let me go!

conversation.speaker: Marcia
conversation.line: Stop whining you little baby! Get over here!

conversation.speaker: Marcia
conversation.line: You spineless sop! You never learn, do you?

conversation.speaker: Ike
conversation.line: What's going on?

conversation.speaker: Marcia
conversation.line: Listen to this, Ike! While I was changing my clothes, my dear brother here tried stealing from my purse again!

conversation.speaker: Makalov
conversation.line: Don't do this here! You don't need to tell the whole camp about it, do you?

conversation.speaker: Marcia
conversation.line: Who's created this situation in the first place! And here I was thinking that you'd finally turned yourself around... Even as we speak, Mother is at home weeping in her soup! You chowderhead!

conversation.speaker: Makalov
conversation.line: Don't worry about Mom! Dad's there to take care of her.

conversation.speaker: Marcia
conversation.line: You brainless eunuch! Gaaaaaa!!!

conversation.speaker: Makalov
conversation.line: M-Marcia! Ow! Ow! My foot! You're crushing it! I heard something crunch! Help! I'm being crippled!

conversation.speaker: Marcia
conversation.line: And no one cares!

conversation.speaker: Ike
conversation.line: All right, all right. I think that's enough.

conversation.speaker: Marcia
conversation.line: Hmph! It's one thing that you're a guppy-brained lout... But it's worse that you never, ever change! You're ALWAYS being chased by thugs, and I ALWAYS have to go looking for you. Do you have any idea how much I worry? Would it hurt you to think of others once in a while? You're my OLDER brother, remember?

conversation.speaker: Makalov
conversation.line: Marcia...

conversation.speaker: Makalov
conversation.line: I'm sorry! I'll give up gambling. I'll work hard and repay all of my debts! Please, you've gotta believe me!

conversation.speaker: Ike
conversation.line: Why not forgive him? He's the only brother you've got, right?

conversation.speaker: Marcia
conversation.line: ...Well, if Ike insists...

conversation.speaker: Makalov
conversation.line: R-really? Do you forgive me?

conversation.speaker: Marcia
conversation.line: Only if you keep your word! This is the absolute last time!

conversation.speaker: Makalov
conversation.line: I swear! I swear on Dad's grave.

conversation.speaker: Marcia
conversation.line: Heh... That's not going to work, you twit! Dad's still alive.

conversation.speaker: Makalov
conversation.line: Made you laugh! 'Bout time, too.

conversation.speaker: Ike
conversation.line: Straighten up and don't trouble your sister anymore.

conversation.speaker: Makalov
conversation.line: Say, Marcia?

conversation.speaker: Marcia
conversation.line: What is it, Makalov?

conversation.speaker: Makalov
conversation.line: You want to bet on how long I can keep my promise? I'll give you four-to-one odds!

conversation.speaker: Marcia
conversation.line: AAAHHH!!!
